name: Initiate Jennings
descriptions: Initiate Jennings is a deceased initiate of Lyons' Brotherhood of Steel in Fallout 3.

Jennings, a Brotherhood of Steel initiate, was under the mentorship of Paladin Vargas, a member of the elite squad Lyons' Pride. Sometime after August 17, 2277, Jennings accompanied Lyons' Pride to back up the garrison at the GNR building plaza against a super mutant assault force. Despite the gravity of this situation, Paladin Vargas was supposed to ensure that Jennings could receive combat training while staying away from dangerous heavy combat areas in the ensuing Battle of GNR Plaza. However, in an oversight, Vargas failed to protect Jennings from a super mutant attack on his position. While he survived the initial onslaught, he later died from his wounds.
During their search for their father, the Lone Wanderer may have observed Jennings not long after his death if they happened to arrive in Chevy Chase as the battle was occurring.
